review.text: “A hardcoded review from a very satisfied customer of VISCOMPLAST's services.”

profiles.title: WHS by VEKA
profiles.description: The WHS by VEKA system optimally combines practicality and affordability. It is designed for manufacturing standard window configurations for consumers.
characteristics: Sealing with two rows of gaskets

profiles.title: VEKA 70
profiles.description: The VEKA 70 profile offers an excellent balance between design, performance, and thermal insulation.
characteristics: Sealing with three rows of gaskets

profiles.title: VEKA 82
profiles.description: The VEKA 82 profile ensures exceptional energy efficiency and superior performance.
characteristics: Sealing with three rows of gaskets

hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: WINKHAUS hardware is renowned for its reliability and longevity. Designed in Germany, it offers a high level of security, functionality, and durability. The intelligent systems ensure perfect sealing and smooth operation of windows and doors.

profiles.title: Kurtoglu 60T
profiles.description: The Kurtoglu 60T profile is ideal for aluminum systems used in residential and commercial construction. It combines modern design with thermal insulation performance.
characteristics: Double or triple glazing up to 24mm

profiles.title: Alutech 75T
profiles.description: The Alutech 75T profile provides exceptional thermal and acoustic insulation, making it perfect for modern construction and energy savings.
characteristics: Suitable for large facades and windows

hardwareSection.title: Hardware
hardwareSection.description: MACO hardware sets the standard of excellence in the industry for window and door fittings. Designed in Austria, it delivers superior security, durability, and ease of use. MACO's intelligent solutions ensure optimal performance, energy efficiency, and enhanced comfort.

slidingSystemsSection.title: Sliding Systems
slidingSystemsSection.description: The WHS system by VEKA optimally combines practicality and accessibility. It is designed for manufacturing windows in standard configurations for consumers. Using 6-chamber profile systems and energy-efficient double-glazed windows allows you to provide the necessary level of comfort in your home. WHS systems by VEKA allow the installation of double-glazed windows with enhanced noise protection.

sponsorSection.title: Our Partners
sponsorSection.description: We offer a complete range of services for the production and installation of <PVC>PVC</PVC> and <ALUMINIU>aluminum</ALUMINIU> structures using profile systems <RAMPLAST>RAMPLAST</RAMPLAST>, <GEALAN>GEALAN</GEALAN>, <VEKA>VEKA</VEKA>, and <KURTOGLU>KURTOGLU</KURTOGLU>. In manufacturing structures, we use only high-quality hardware from <WINKHAUS>WINKHAUS</WINKHAUS> and <GU>G-U</GU>.

offerSteps.title: Consultation and Design
offerSteps.description: Our sales managers will help you choose the profile, glass, color, and hardware for your project. You will then receive a price offer with all the discussed details.

offerSteps.title: Measurement
offerSteps.description: Once the order is confirmed, the engineer will visit you to perform the final measurements.

offerSteps.title: Production
offerSteps.description: Depending on the complexity of the project, the execution time varies between 5 and 15 working days.

offerSteps.title: Installation
offerSteps.description: A team of professional installers will come to safely install your joinery.

aboutDescription: We are a company built on the values of a family business with the intention to produce PVC and Aluminum joinery at the highest level.

We work together to offer quality services, a good product, and to build long-term relationships. We believe we are stronger due to the complementary skills of our family members and the values we rely on: fairness, excellence, ambition, efficiency, and personal fulfillment.

The strategy we have approached from the beginning is one of natural and organic growth, absolutely customer-oriented. There is no problem that cannot be solved in relation to the customer's requirements.
